isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - INSTALL - AUXILIARY SECTION WITHOUT TAPERED BEARINGS

svcproc.title: AUXILIARY SECTION WITHOUT TAPERED BEARINGS
svcproc.para: There are different bolt lengths, install in the correct location.
Auxiliary sections can be installed either with the transmission in the horizontal position or the vertical position.
To install in the vertical position, the clutch housing must be installed.
To install the auxiliary section in the horizontal position.

step1.para: Position a new gasket on the transmission mounting surface ( Figure 232).

figure.caption: Figure 232. Auxiliary Section Without Tapered Bearings

step1.para: Attach an auxiliary section hanger bracket to the auxiliary section top ( Figure 232).
Attach a lifting chain to the auxiliary section hanger bracket ( Figure 2327).
Position the auxiliary section on the two (2) dowel pins ( Figure 232).
Slide the auxiliary section on until the hanger bracket contacts the front case back.
Remove the auxiliary section hanger bracket.
Slide the auxiliary section the rest of the way into position.
Apply Eaton/Fuller Sealant #71205 or Loctite 242 to the retaining bolts.
Install the retaining bolts and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque ( Figure 233).
To install the auxiliary section in the vertical position.
With blocks under the clutch housing to prevent input shaft damage, place the transmission in the vertical position, clutch housing down.
Position a new gasket on the transmission mounting surface.
Install a steel bar through the yoke ( Figure 234).

figure.caption: Figure 234. Auxiliary Section Over Two Dowel Pins

step1.para: Attach a lifting chain to the steel bar ( Figure 234).
Position the auxiliary section over the two (2) dowel pins ( Figure 234).
Slide the auxiliary section down the dowels.
Apply Eaton/Fuller Sealant #71205 or Loctite 242 to the retaining bolts.
Install the retaining bolts; tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque ( Figure 235).
Remove the steel bar and chain.
